scripts.synth: npm run build; npm run cdk synth -- -q
scripts.cdk:bootstrap: npm run cdk bootstrap -- --app '' --qualifier kcms --toolkit-stack-name KCMSCDKToolkit --cloudformation-execution-policies arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AdministratorAccess
scripts.kcms:bootstrap: npm run synth && npm run deploy KCMSBootstrapStack
